episode_event_salon_pasiosalon_date_ch02:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] went shopping
in town with Penny.

Awesome! I got some limited-edition Veevee
merch!

Your knack for finding stuff is wild,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!

Um...[Name:PlayerNickname ]...
About today...
Um...hang on a sec...

After a few moments, a text appeared on
[Name:PlayerNickname ]’s Poryphone.

It was from Penny, thanking
[Name:PlayerNickname ] for [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] help.

... ... ...
Um...so that’s what I wanted to say...
Hm? Why not just say it in person?
I, um... I just...

I have a hard time speaking face-to-face...
I just can’t get the words out...
I can’t seem to put my thoughts into words...
It’s hard, isn’t it? Expressing your feelings?

So...I, um...just kinda use my own way...
But I guess it’s kinda weird...
(Say her way’s OK.)
R-really? You don’t mind?
(Tell her it’s not weird at all.)
R-really? I guess if you say so...

Y’know...I’ve always thought this, but your
heart’s as big as the Wild Area.

You and everyone else have been so
accepting of someone like me...

I have a feeling that’s why things have gone
so well for me here on Pasio.
If you ever run into trouble, let me know.

I’ll definitely help you out,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Days later...

It was just another ordinary day...until
trouble struck.

Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Enjoying your time at school?

Hm? Why’re you clutching your phone
like that?
Did something happen? An emergency?
WHAT?! Someone hacked your social media?!

Got it. Gimme your phone! I’ll take care
of it...
Phew. That should do it.

I hacked them right back to teach them a
lesson!
(Thank her for the help.)
Um...sure. I mean...I promised you, so...
(Tell her you’re amazed.)
Um...nah, I didn’t really do all that much.

Oh, by the way... You should see if your
account’s fully recovered.
Everything OK? Nothing strange?
An account you don’t know is following you?
Oh, my bad. That’s me.

I wanted to make sure everything was
working properly and forgot to undo it...
Here, I’ll fix that...
Huh? You want me to stop?
Whoa! I got a notification!
A...message? From someone new?
“Thanks for following me! Let’s be mutuals.”
Oh! This is you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Um...sure! As long as you don’t mind...
With just one condition...
Please don’t tell anyone this account is mine.
It wouldn’t be a problem or anything...
but it’d be nice to keep it just between us.
